You arrived at home as you,Tori and Mom got down from the car and get inside the house.Mom head straight to her room shutting the door.You and Tori went to your shared room.You and Tori shared a room together with a bed each.You and Tori has decided when to separate the room to halve for you and her to store and décor as you like as long each one of you didn’t cross the border.So, your room now has blue paint on one side and pink on the other as your stuff was on the blue side and your sister on the pink side.

You sat down on your bed and Tori sat on her.She still look scared of the accident at the Sally house.

“Hey little bro,what happened to you back there ? its scary.” She said as she lay down on her bed while playing with her doll.

“Well,it’s hard to explain,Okay I have something to talk to you, but you must never tell other people.” Said you scratching your head while smile awkwardly.You puzzled in whatever to tell your sister or not.You couldn’t help, so you decided to tell your sister.

“I promise,now tell me.” She said as she sat up on her bed, looking at you with curiosity at her eyes.

“The thing is I recently found out I got super power.This power enable me to somehow connect to people mind, hearing their thought and influence them a bit.” Said you as you explain your power to Tori.

“Really ?, I don’t believe you,prove it to me. Tell me what am I thinking right now.” She said with skeptical face.She then asked you with smug on her face.You see gleam in her eyes as she was curious whatever you’re telling the truth or not.So, you decided to connect to your sister as to prove your words.

What is he saying ?,

this is a bit ridiculous.

But David is a good kid who hate to lie maybe he telling the truth ?

Why he hide it ?

Why he tell me ?

Is Mom okay ?

I want to buy new doll

You shook your head as her thought flow into you.

“You are curious about my power and worried about Mom.You also want to buy new doll.Tori what is wrong with you ? you already has many doll.” You said as you pointing at her collection of doll which consisted of Barbie which she kept in a box below her desk to stuffed doll line up on her bed.

Your sister and her friend, Sally, likes to collect all kind of dolls.She and Sally share the same hobby that’s why she and her are good friend.She and Sally like to play and compare their collection.Once a time you were brought to Sally’s doll collection room which was a whole a room full of dolls ranging from Barbie to creepy porcelain doll.

“Hey, Girl can have as many doll she like. Don’t you forget that. Anyway its true you can read my mind.Its so cool !, what else can you do ? show me show me !.” Said Tori as she smile brightly.She lean her body forward as she nudged you to show her your power.

“Well, I can make you do something with my mind.” You said excitedly.You began influencing her to dance one of her Ballet move.Your sister when she was little she take ballet for two years.She got up from her bed and make quick twirl in the middle of the room.She executed it with nonchalant face as if she didn’t notice that you were influencing her.

“Come on,show me.You can make me do anything. Ah, but something indecent is no go.” She said to you with the same smile as before as if she still didn’t notice her predicament.

“Already did !, look you are dancing right now !, I just make you do ballet move and it succeed.” You said laughing a little to her obliviousness of the situation she’s in right now.

“This is just me want to dance a little, its been a long time since I practice my ballet move.I want stretch a little.” She said as she continued her ballet dance.You stopped laughing as you were amazed at how she thought that she was the one thinking that she want to do it herself.

It seem to you, that your power is more amazing that your thought.You began influencing again.This time to make her fart as loud as she could.Suddenly from her, you could heard loud breeeet sound and a moment later the smell invaded your nose.

You waved your hand to blow the smell away.You got up and walked to the window in your room to open it, so the smell go away.

info.brief_description: You learn you have the ability to "Sync" your mind with others. Anything goes, please add!
info.description:
You are a senior in highschool who is about to stumble upon a strange ability. Essentially, if you focus your thoughts intensely toward someone near, they will sync with your mind, allowing a two way communication of thoughts between the two. They're completely synchronized, so their decisions mix with yours, and vice versa. Two become one mentally, as it were. Naturally, this doesn't include synchronizing motor functions (so you can't make them run into walls or cause ridiculous accidents via different postures, etc), only the decisions and thoughts themselves become as one. Focusing on someone/something else can turn off the link, but being linked to a person for too long can become addicting and can lead to some very strange circumstances.

Here are the different types of syncs you can discover. They are not limited to these, but these are definitely the major types. Your powers are largely undiscovered, so have fun exploring! Try to keep with this theme, however.

Human Sync - What this story will focus on in the beginning, the easiest of the Sync possibilities. When you Sync with a human, your thoughts mix with theirs. You may not notice it at first, as their thoughts will seem to flow naturally with yours, but soon you notice they're acting on your impulses and you're acting on theirs as well. The longer you Sync, the more integrated the two of you become in each other. Syncing can be good for concentrating and planning, as the saying goes, "Two heads are better than one".
Weak willed people tend to get lost in the other person's mind, so be careful with syncing with strong willed or submissive people. The feeling can become addicting over time as well, so be wary of that.
At first, only one on one links are possible, but with enough training, you may be able to sync with more people.
The people synced to you may resist at first, but eventually as their will mixes with yours, they will blend with you mentally and become fully synced. Too long of a sync can be damaging to your personality, however, so be careful!

Distance Sync - The more distant the target, the harder it is to link with them mentally. That's not to say it's impossible, but you may have to develop your powers by targetting people in visual range first.

Animal Sync - While it is possible to sync with animals, doing so is very dangerous due to the simplicity of their thought patterns. Can lead to incredibly strange circumstances, as their primitive thoughts will mix with yours and strongly influence your judgement. BE CAREFUL with that one!

Plant Sync - This can be dangerous as well, but not nearly as much as Animal Sync. Plants can be treated like Objects below for detachment, but since plants have a life force, this can be a bit tricky. Since they have no will power of their own, it isn't mentally dangerous, but it can lead to some very strange sensations in the body as you feel what the plant does. Trees can make you feel stronger, flowers will make you weaker, grass will give you more energy in direct sunlight, etc.

Object Sync - With enough practice, it may be possible to sync with inanimate objects. This can be good for detaching from people, but you cannot give inanimate objects new life by linking to them. They will have the same motor skills as usual, but with enough concentration, you can control them at will. Includes toys, clothes, jewelry, anything!

Syncing others - Be careful when hopping quickly from sync to sync, as too quick of a sync can drag your connection with the first into the second, and without realizing it you can link the two syncees together. This can be used to your advantage, of course, especially in helping arguing people understand one another over time and can be used to torment enemies. This can be detrimental if overdone or done for extended periods of time, however, as the mind power of the synced becomes twofold of a normal person, making ambush attacks more likely. Definitely hold off on that kind of behavior until your powers develop more.

Cross Sync - Like you, you are able to sync two objects together. You can sync other people to plants, animals, objects, in much of the same way you yourself can. Syncing two objects together doesn't really accomplish anything, but you could sync your cell phone to grass for a solar powered phone or sync the old lady across the street with a tree to help fortify her withering strength.

Emotional Ties - Be careful with syncing over long periods of time, however. Just like thoughts, intense emotions are shared via the link between the two. Syncing with a person near death can have untold effects on the mind, especially if the person passes on while synced. If you sync past their death, the result could be catastrophic, so avoid linking for too long to people like that. Same goes for objects and plants like trees about to be chopped.

So please add! I retain the right to edit all chapters as I see fit. I'll only edit if I don't like where the narrative is going or if the writing quality isn't up to par with where I'd like it to be. I'll try to keep the rewrites to a minimum where possible. Also, more than a single paragraph, please. Don't be afraid to write new chapters, however, as even a bad chapter can help inspire where the story should go and I'll try to respect that direction in the rewrite should it require one. I want it to be readable and interesting.

As with many stories of this type here, things may get erotic, they may not. If it's called for at that point in the story, then by all means, do it. It shouldn't be an endless orgy, of course, only do this when the story calls for it. Any time you add to a part of the story that involves this, always add a chapter decision to allow for exiting the act. I'm rating it 18+, so anything goes.

Character descriptions will be added as the story progresses, so different story types are available, but once someone sets up a storyline, don't stray from the descriptions already made. You can add to those descriptions, but don't get careless or too many plotholes will open up. I will edit based on that as well.

Also, no story ending! If an end is added, the chapter will be edited or deleted to allow for an open ended option. Always add at least two options when ending a chapter, please.

And that's it! It's a fun concept, so I hope you all have fun with it. So now, get to the reading and chapter writing!
